item.description: Music for Mali is a benefit concert and opening reception (for VIP ticket holders) including Cheick Hamala Diabate (from Mali) and his band, Balla Kouyate (from Mali) and World Vision, and Paddy Keenan (2011 Lifetime Achievement Award Winner from the Irish Music Association). Money raised from ticket sales will benefit refugees from the crisis in Mali through the work of Relief International. The opening reception begins at 6:00, and the concert at 7:30. More information and tickets athttp://music-for-mali.eventbrite.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Right off Exit 34 on 495, in Chelmsford. You can see it from the highway.
item.name: Music for Mali Concert -- Meet ahead for dinner, or just the concert?
